title: Trust in online customer reviews 2014 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 6 different Responses for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 5 groups, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL in Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others and 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Yes always.
Among all the Responses, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 27.0 in Response Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic and lowest value 3.0 in Response No I don't trust reviews at all.
There is a gap of 24.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017 in Response Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic and No I don't trust reviews at all.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Responses on X-axis for 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 5 groups, and it was for 2014. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response Yes always for 2014.
Among all the Responses, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 27.0 in Response Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic and lowest value 3.0 in Response No I don't trust reviews at all.
There is a gap of 24.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017 in Response Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic and No I don't trust reviews at all.
Among the groups, 2014 had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 34.0 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.

In Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others, 2014 had the highest SOME LABEL 34.0 among the 5 groups and in Yes always, 2014 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0. The second highest SOME LABEL 27.0 was observed for 2014 in Response Yes for some types of businesses no for others.

Averaging all 5 groups 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018, the Response Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic is the maximum SOME LABEL and No I am often skeptical about online reviews is the minimum SOME LABEL.

data.Response: Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic
Yes for some types of businesses no for others
Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read
No I am often skeptical about online reviews
